title: Keepin' It Spicy!
description:
This week, the crew tackles the do’s and don’ts of battle ropes in the gym and in the bedroom? For real though. Jillian and the cast give tips on how to keep your private parts on point (a.k.a the healthy vagina diet). Plus, maximizing your workouts with functional training tools, Cindy teaches the team that a smile can save the day, and, Giancarlo goes in with caller Kelly on how to bring the heat back to the bedroom.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
